item.title: Dick Morris to Newsmax: Democratic Party's Future Is Bleak
item.description: If current trends continue, there may not be a Democratic Party in the future, presidential adviser Dick Morris said on Newsmax Saturday.

item.title: Dr. Nusbaum to Newsmax: MAHA Is About Survival, Not Ideology

item.title: Democrats Work to Counter Texas Redistricting Plan
item.description: Democrats across America are paying attention to a mostly Republican-controlled redistricting plan in Texas and looking at ways to counter the move.

item.title: Sen. Grassley to Newsmax: Congress Must Prevent Another 'Weaponized' FBI
